properties.name: far2away.core.exception.globalHandler.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable exception global handler, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.i18n.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable i18n enhancement, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.jackson.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable jackson enhancement, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.jackson.i18nDetails.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable jackson i18nDetails serialize, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.jackson.i18nEnum.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable jackson i18nEnum serialize, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.jackson.number2string.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable jackson number2string, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.jackson.date2timestamp.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable jackson date2timestamp, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.jackson.defaultSetting.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable jackson defaultSetting, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable metrics record, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.mybatis.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable mybatis enhancement, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.p6spy.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable p6spy, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.p6spy.appender
properties.description: # specifies the appender to use for logging # (default is com.github.far2away.core.spring.p6spy.P6spySqlLogger)

properties.name: far2away.core.p6spy.logMessageFormat
properties.description: # class to use for formatting log messages (default is com.github.far2away.core.spring.p6spy.P6spySqlFormat)

properties.name: far2away.core.p6spy.dateformat
properties.description: # sets the date format using Java's SimpleDateFormat routine (default is yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS)

properties.name: far2away.core.p6spy.databaseDialectDateFormat
properties.description: # format that is used for logging of the java.util.Date implementations (default is yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS)

properties.name: far2away.core.p6spy.databaseDialectTimestampFormat
properties.description: # format that is used for logging of the java.sql.Timestamp implementations (default is yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS)

properties.name: far2away.core.p6spy.jmx
properties.description: # whether to expose options via JMX or not (default is false)

properties.name: far2away.core.schedule.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable schedule enhancement, true is enable, default is true
